PerfectNetExp.abs: 地质学专业词汇中英翻译(4) ... 黑晶 black quartz 黑晶 morion 黑晶石 magnalumoxide.
A 军官，16世纪后期和17世纪前期，穿着半身盔甲，有华丽的西班牙头盔（morion）加上可能是红-白-红的羽饰，红色的皮带，并且握着一把刺剑（rapier）。

derivation.yuyuan_name: French, from Spanish morrión, from morro 'round object'
mid 18th cent.: from French, from Latin morion, a misreading (in Pliny) for mormorion

means.word_mean: 1. a metal helmet worn by common soldiers in the 16th century
